name: CrossWorm Puzzle
description:
The worms and fish have gotten sick of being used for humans' amusement. Choose the correct worms to tangle up the fishermen's lines without hitting any fish.

Levels 1-1 through 2-3 are playable. The levels in the third lake are not complete.

A submission to the Golden Bear Game Jam - Spring 2023.

Developed by:

  • Kyle Rautzhan - Level Design
  • snowsetdeer - Art
  • Aaron Harman - Programming/Music
